title: How to Make a Traffic Light Drink

steps.headline: Pour one shot of vodka into each glass.
Pour the Midori into one of the glass.
Pour the orange juice into one of the other glasses.
Pour the cranberry juice into the last glass.
Drink each one down: red, yellow, and green.

text: Set up three shot glasses.  Pour one shot of vodka into each glass.  Pour the Midori into one of the glass.  Pour the orange juice into one of the other glasses.  Pour the cranberry juice into the last glass.  Drink each one down: red, yellow, and green.
